about_the_game:
In Delivery Simulator, you are behind the wheel of a delivery vehicle navigating the ever-changing layout of a sprawling metropolis. Your core mission is to deliver an increasing number of packages each day to various destinations across the city.

As the game progresses, you’ll face the challenge of not only maintaining speed and efficiency but also managing your vehicle’s capacity and energy consumption. Start with a basic car with limited space and fuel efficiency. As you earn money from completed deliveries, you have the opportunity to upgrade your vehicle. Enhancements include increasing the storage capacity to handle more packages at once and improving fuel efficiency for longer routes without the need for frequent refueling.

Your strategic skills will be put to the test as you decide which upgrades to purchase and when to apply them to benefit the most from your earnings. Each upgrade will help in coping with the growing demands of your delivery schedule, requiring you to balance speed, volume, and sustainability.

Can you optimize your route and vehicle to become the ultimate delivery master in Delivery Simulator? This game combines strategy, time management, and simulation for an immersive delivery driving experience.

Your strategic skills will be put to the test as you decide which upgrades to purchase and when to apply them to benefit the most from your earnings. Each upgrade will help in coping with the growing demands of your delivery schedule, requiring you to balance speed, volume, and sustainability.

name: Delivery Express

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 5th
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce 1070
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: "Delivery Simulator": Drive and upgrade your delivery vehicle to handle more packages and improve energy efficiency. Tackle increasing daily challenges to become the ultimate delivery master.
